DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether single dose PF-05230901 safe well tolerate give healthy volunteer injection skin . An additional objective measure blood concentration PF-05230901 . Each dose test different group subject start low dose .
DOC.brief_title: A Study In Healthy Subjects Of Single Doses PF-05230901 Injected Under The Skin
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject History seizure , include childhood seizure . History movement disorder related neurological condition . History head trauma associate loss consciousness .
